page.title: 16MY LEISURE TIME. by Kate.
page.content: I have lots to do in my spare time.On Sunday morning I go to Sunday School at the local United Reformed Chapel. Guides is held at the Youth Centre on a Monday night from 7pm.to 9pm.At the moment a group of us are working for our Entertainer's Badge.We are producing our own play and dance.On Tuesday evening I always go to the Library in Boot Hill.When I am there I look at books about hobbies and interests.Sometimes I bring some books home to read.Usually I read about five books a month.I always look forward to Thursday when I go to Youth Club.I enjoy playing pool and table tennis and I always watch "East Enders"-a soap opera-on the television while I am there.I am very fond of reading and I like to crochet and knit.When the weather is good I play on the recreation ground with my friends.
